snippet: The Swiss drug giant Roche Holding said it was "disappointed" that Illumina had rejected its revised $6 billion dollar, which it had raised last week from an earlier bid of $5.7 billion.
abstract: The Swiss drug giant Roche Holding said it was "disappointed" that Illumina had rejected its revised $6 billion dollar, which it had raised last week from an earlier bid of $5.7 billion.

headline.main: Roche Answers Illumina's Jibe at Revised Offer
